newsitem.title: USA: Eltrax Systems posts 9-month period loss.
newsitem.headline: Eltrax Systems posts 9-month period loss.

text.p: Eltrax Systems Inc said for nine-month period ended December 31, 1996 it incurred a loss of $1.1 million or $0.16 per share on revenue of $28.1 million.
The company changed its year end to December 31 from March 31, resulting in a transitional short reporting period ending December 31.

During that transition, Eltrax sold its historical card business, so those results are presented as discontinued operations. The transition period results include operations of Eltrax's Datatech subsidiary from its May 17, 1996 acquisition. Its ANS subsidiary is accounted for as a pooling of interests, and thus its results are included for the entire transition period and for prior periods.
